title: LTB: Chief Bender, Sweet Cap red back w hat
author: YankeeHotelFoxtrot

posts.post_title: LTB: Chief Bender, Sweet Cap red back w hat
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy this card, raw, or graded 
thank you

All Sweet Caporal backs are red, and two of Bender’s three T206 cards show him with a hat on. Maybe you should be more specific what you are looking for, just trying to help

P.S.- The difference between the two Bender cards that show him with a hat on, is one has trees in the background and the other does not. 

Good Luck
